title: Flex team with gold in mind
body:
**Requirements**
-Level 50+
-Gold and above border from last season
-Mic

replies.body:
Me and my friend are looking for a ranked team

my acc:

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=MrTwinkiee

his acc:

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=teapot00

we  ~~*forgot our logins on our main accounts and cant access them*~~ <- totally what happened

both gold/plat skill level currently in silver due to a lack of patience for solo q


I main JG in solo, but can also do mid and supp pretty well

He mains ADC

both veteran players playing since season 2

both have voice

bump

let's get more players for the weekend :P

bump

so far I think I've only found 1 player that has been actively playing...
hmu LeftyRaydy. I am a gold/plat Mid Main

Teams are complicated to get going, if you're looking for a dedicated support hit me up, I'm silver 4 rn, not looking to sink time into another dead team that just ends up bailing a week after practicing tho. I'm free usually after 8pm ish, and I usually have plenty of days off.
Well I main jungle and am free on weekends, tuesdays, and soon to be weekday nights

One of my biggest complaint with team managing, is that I really hate players that don't actively seek games with us.

The whole "get 4 players then I'll play with you guys" mentality will not work here.

Teams aren't made overnight.
